posts.post_content: Alliances was generally a good set, but it had so many god-awful commons that it almost drove me drink. Cards like this, [Astrolabe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Astrolabe), [Aesthir Glider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aesthir Glider), [Soldevi Steam Beast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soldevi Steam Beast) and [Soldevi Sentry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soldevi Sentry) populated way too many booster packs.
